department: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
short_summary: Internal control assessments for financial management processes, including financial reporting
description: The Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (IRB) requires qualified professionals to complete internal control assessments over financial management processes, including financial reporting. This entails documenting the key controls, which includes completing both a narrative and a controls matrix, as well as performing design effectiveness testing.

full_summary:
**Internal Control Assessments: Request for Proposal**

**Reference Number:** cb-779-76495975
**Publication Date:** December 18, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 19, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
**Procurement Category:** SRV (Service)

**Background**

The Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (IRB) is seeking qualified professionals to conduct internal control assessments over financial management processes. The purpose of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to engage external experts to evaluate and document the effectiveness of key financial controls, including financial reporting.

**Services Required**

The successful candidate will provide professional audit support services, including:

- Documenting key financial controls
- Completing a narrative and controls matrix
- Performing design effectiveness testing

**Eligibility**

This opportunity is open to all qualified firms capable of providing the required services.

**Evaluation Criteria**

The selection criteria will be based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

**Regions of Opportunity**

The successful candidate will be required to work in the National Capital Region and potentially across Canada.

**Contracting Entity**

The contracting entity for this opportunity is the Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada.

**Contact Information**

Kris Rickett
Procurement Officer
343-541-7157 (phone)
email: kris.rickett@irb-cisr.gc.ca

For more information, please refer to the attached documents, available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27800/professional-audit-support-services.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27800/professional-audit-support-services.pdf). (PDF, 2 pages) (English only)
